scripts.version: chmod +x ./scripts/verify-node-version.sh && ./scripts/verify-node-version.sh && npm run docs && git add ./docs/* && npm run bundle && git add -A ./dist
scripts.test: npm run compile && mkdir -p test && cp -rf lib/* test && mocha ./spec/*
scripts.test:parallel: npm run compile && mkdir -p test && cp -rf lib/* test && mocha --parallel ./spec/*
scripts.test:src: mkdir -p test && cp -rf src/* test && mocha ./spec/*
scripts.test:src:parallel: mkdir -p test && cp -rf src/* test && mocha --parallel ./spec/*
scripts.test:bundled: npm run bundle && BUNDLED=true PACKAGE_VERSION=$(echo $npm_package_version) mocha ./spec/*
scripts.test:bundled:parallel: npm run bundle && BUNDLED=true PACKAGE_VERSION=$(echo $npm_package_version) mocha --parallel ./spec/*
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:bundled
scripts.test:all:parallel: npm run test:parallel & npm run test:bundled:parallel
scripts.bundle: rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run compile && node bundle.js
